languages.text: "Завидую отваге Лорд-капитана — порвать с убийцей из культа смерти, да еще и остаться с ней в одном секторе".
"Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."
languages.original_text: "Завидую отваге Лорд-капитана — порвать с убийцей из культа смерти, да еще и остаться с ней в одном секторе".

traits.locale_text: "Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."
"Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."
"Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."
"Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."
"Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."

languages.text: "Mit einer Assassin eines Todeskults Schluss machen und im selben Sektor wie sie bleiben? Der Lord Captain hat Mumm."
languages.original_text: "Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."

traits.locale_text: "Mit einer Assassin eines Todeskults Schluss machen und im selben Sektor wie sie bleiben? Der Lord Captain hat Mumm."

languages.text: « {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} ne manque pas de cran, pour oser rester dans les parages après avoir rompu avec un assassin du culte de la mort. »
languages.original_text: "Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} ne manque pas de cran, pour oser rester dans les parages après avoir rompu avec un assassin du culte de la mort. »

languages.text: «¿Romper con una asesina del Culto de la Muerte y seguir en el mismo sector que ella? Qué agallas tiene {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."

traits.locale_text: «¿Romper con una asesina del Culto de la Muerte y seguir en el mismo sector que ella? Qué agallas tiene {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「デスカルト・アサシンから離れ、彼女と同じ部署に留まる？ロード・キャプテンは度胸があるわね」
languages.original_text: "Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."

traits.locale_text: 「デスカルト・アサシンから離れ、彼女と同じ部署に留まる？ロード・キャプテンは度胸があるわね」

languages.text: “和身为拜死教刺客的女朋友分手，之后居然还敢待在她身边？舰长大人胆子还真不小。”
languages.original_text: "Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."

traits.locale_text: “和身为拜死教刺客的女朋友分手，之后居然还敢待在她身边？舰长大人胆子还真不小。”

languages.original_text: "Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."

languages.text: "Bir ölüm tarikatı suikastçısından ayrılıp onunla aynı sektörde yaşamak mı? Lord Kaptan'da da iyi cesaret varmış."
languages.original_text: "Breaking up with a death cult assassin and staying in the same sector as her? The Lord Captain's got guts."
